tesla.title: TeslaXHer
tesla.description:
Team project for school where the main goal was to redesign Tesla’s dashboard, in the style of a movie of our choice. We chose the movie Her.
The main challenge for us was that we had to design an entire interface from a movie that contained only very few graphical elements.

lbpc.title: LBPC
lbpc.description: Les Plus Beaux Châteaux is a school project for a real client where the main goal was to give visitors all the data they needed before visiting a castle in France. The website had to be a Wordpress so the owner could add any data he wanted. Visitors can also see events and places related to a castle.

delivrhetic.title: Delivr'hetic
delivrhetic.description: Delivr’Hetic is a school project made for a special week called “Intensive Week”. We had 5 days to design and develop a mobile app. We choose to create an app that let students of our school order meals to other students who are going to buy lunch outside.
